alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson; O'Brien; Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 5:31AM CDT until June 24 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Osceola County in northwestern Iowa... Dickinson County in northwestern Iowa... Clay County in northwestern Iowa... O`Brien County in northwestern Iowa... Jackson County in southwestern Minnesota... Nobles County in southwestern Minnesota... Murray County in southwestern Minnesota... Cottonwood County in southwestern Minnesota... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 531 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chandler to near Ocheyedan to near Paullina, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ocheyedan and Current Lake around 535 AM CDT. Slayton around 540 AM CDT. Fulda, Round Lake and Harris around 545 AM CDT. Lake Park, Currie and Lake Shetek State Park around 550 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Okoboji, Everly, Royal, Wahpeton, Dovray, Spirit Lake, Westbrook, Orleans, Greenville, Spencer In Clay County, Storden, Lakefield, Fostoria and Superior. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
